pinyin: háo jiǔ bù jiàn, jīn tiān quán jiā rén yì qǐ lái chī fàn!

en: Our company's leaders organize a trip for employees and their families every year.

en: Ah Yue's meatball is a classic Beijing snack.

en: After rectification, the management of the company has undergone a significant transformation.

en: This salt field was left by my ancestors.
